message: Can I order a pepperoni pizza and some chicken nuggets

Great! I found Pepperoni for AED 43.0 and Chicken Nuggets for AED 19.0 on our menu. Would you like to place an order for these items? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel.

Also, to complete the order, I will need a few details from you:
- NYU ID (8 digits)
- Valid building number (options: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C)
- Phone number (9-15 digits)

Great! I have added a Pepperoni for AED 43.0 and Chicken Nuggets for AED 19.0 to your order. Now, to complete the order, I will need some more details from you:
- NYU ID (8 digits)
- Valid building number (options: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C)
- Phone number (9-15 digits)
Please provide these details to complete your order. If you have any questions or need assistance with this, feel free to ask.

Thank you for providing your NYU ID. Now, I will need a valid building number (options: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C) and your phone number (9-15 digits) to complete the order. Please provide these details to continue. If you have any questions or need assistance with this, feel free to ask.
